definition: erhua variant of 一股腦|一股脑[yi1 gu3 nao3]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

thigh/part of a whole/portion of a sum/(stock) share/strand of a thread/low-level administrative unit, translated as "section" or "department" etc, ranked below 科[ke1]/classifier for long winding things like ropes, rivers etc/classifier for smoke, smells etc: thread, puff, whiff/classifier for bands of people, gangs etc/classifier for sudden forceful actions
brain/mind/head/essence
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
child/son
non-syllabic diminutive suffix/retroflex final

sentences.english: You dig up the past, all you get is dirty.
sentences.chinese: 你把过去一股脑儿都挖了出来，那可都是见不得人的。

sentences.english: He and I went to the train and put the oranges peremptorily on my fur coat .
sentences.chinese: 他和我走到车上，将桔子一股脑儿放在我的皮大衣上。

sentences.english: She got so excited that she poured out all she had to say at once.
sentences.chinese: 她兴奋得很，把要讲的话一股脑儿都倒出来了。

definition: all of it/lock, stock and barrel
variant of 一股腦兒|一股脑儿[yi1 gu3 nao3 r5]
regardless of the consequences/recklessly relying on a hopelessly optimistic forecast
pinyin: bu4 guan3 san1 qi1 er4 shi2 yi1

definition: lit. count by fives and tens (idiom); to narrate systematically and in full detail
to shake out/to bring to light/to squander
to gather/to rake together/to pile up
to pour beans out of a bamboo tube/to come clean/to make a clean breast of things
with a crash/with a thunderous noise
to cast or put aside/to forget for a while
thoroughly (idiom)/completely/one and all/very clean
an assortment/a bit of everything/lots of different (skills)
to allow no explanation
from beginning to end/in its entirety/in accord with fact/literal
one by one/one after another
brains (as food)
like a swarm of bees/everyone swarms around pushing and shouting/a hornet's nest
